## tuple variable

Higher order helper word to [collect](./pointfree.collect.md) tuples of pre-defined size `n`<!-- -->. The size can be given as number or a stack function producing a number.

( ... -- \[...\])

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
tuple: (n: number | StackFn) => StackFn
```
